message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY. 

This paper focuses on training a deep neural network for robot control using synthetic data and simulation, which falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO). The paper also heavily relies on computer vision techniques for perception, specifically using RGB images to extract affordances, which suggests a connection to computer vision (cs.CV). The use of deep learning for training the neural network also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the evaluation of the system's performance on a physical robot arm suggests a connection to systems and control (cs.SY).
